column1: Uchi////Anniversary dinner -- so we picked our favorite restaurant in town even though less formal than we usually would go to for this occasion. As much as we love Uchi
column2: this meal was even better. Every course was perfectly prepared and flavorful. We went with some well known staples (brus. sprouts
column5: but ventured into some new fish specials
column6: including the amber jack and branzino. All delicious. The staff made us feel special too with a few surprises to celebrate our special day.
